duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieve sales goals and balance daily business and High Jewelry sales
Develop a network and a loyal clientele
Attend social functions within the community to generate new business and invite clients to in-boutique events
Utilize social media and other supports to reach out to current and prospective clients
Capture and maintain accurate client data, communicate novelties and events, and conduct gifting campaigns
Assist in display set up each morning, ensure product safety, and provide excellent customer service
Follow up on after sales service and the repair process, ensuring customer satisfaction
Follow Maison policies and procedures involving security, consignments, and valuation requests
Share the Van Cleef & Arpels history, quality standards, and collection information with clients
